## {#about-page data-menu-title="Create a nice landing page"}

<p class="slide-title">Turn your landing page (`index.qmd`) into an "[About Page](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-about.html)</p>

::: {.panel-tabset}

## `index.qmd` YAML
```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
---
title: "samantha csik" # if using a built-in template, this appears under your photo
image: headshot.jpg # great spot for your professional headshot :) 
about: 
  template: trestles # see other templates at https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-about.html#templates
  image-shape: rounded
  image-width: 15em
  links:
    - icon: linkedin # you'll need to the fontawesome extension to include icons: https://github.com/quarto-ext/fontawesome
      text: LinkedIn
      href: https://www.linkedin.com/in/samanthacsik/
    - icon: twitter
      text: Twitter
      href: https://twitter.com/SamanthaCsik
    - icon: github
      text: GitHub
      href: https://github.com/samanthacsik
    - icon: envelope
      text: Email
      href: mailto:scsik@ucsb.edu
---
```

<p class="caption-text">To install the quarto fontawesome extension, run `quarto install extension quarto-ext/fontawesome` in your RStudio terminal. You'll need to install this for each project where you'd like to use fontawesome icons.</p>

## {#add-pages data-menu-title="Add pages"}

<p class="slide-title">Add additional web pages to your navbar</p>

::: {.panel-tabset}

## `_quarto.yml` file

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
---
project:
  type: website
  output-dir: docs

website:
  title: "samantha csik"
  navbar:
    title: samanthacsik
    right: # align navbar items to the right/left/center
      - href: index.qmd
        text: home # use 'text' option to update the name as it appears in your navbar
      - about.qmd
      - resources.qmd
      - href: CV/SCsik_CV.pdf
        text: cv
      - icon: github # add icons that link to social media, etc.
        href: https://github.com/samanthacsik
      - icon: twitter
        href: https://twitter.com/SamanthaCsik

format:
  html:
    theme: cosmo
    css: styles.css
    toc: true
---
```

## Output

<center><img src="images/add_navbar_items.png" width="600"/></center>

:::
